      • addToReferencePoint

        public static void addToReferencePoint(java.awt.geom.Point2D p)
        adjusts the reference point from which the grid will be painted.
        Parameters:
        p - - the x/y amount by which the reference point will be adjusted

      • drawGrid

        public void drawGrid(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
        draws the grid. It consists of to components a main grid with cellSize and a finer subgrid.
        Parameters:
        g2 - - the Graphics2D of Canvas

      • generateGrid

        public java.awt.geom.Path2D generateGrid(int numCells)
        generate a grid that subdivides the cellSize
        Parameters:
        numCells - - the number of subdivision in x/y of cellSize.
        Returns:
        the grid
